inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically diagnosis of prostate cancer with positive IDC-P
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: High-risk localized prostate cancer, defined by either: Tumor stage ≥T3a by digital rectal examination, or Primary tumor Gleason score ≥ 8, or PSA > 20 ng/mL
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: The ECOG score of the patient is ≤2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must participate voluntarily and sign an informed consent form (ICF), indicating that they understand the purpose and required procedures of the study, and are willing to participate in. Patients must be willing to obey the prohibitions and restrictions specified in the research protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematologic, renal and hepatic function: Absolute neutrophil count [ANC] ≥1.5 x 10^9/L
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Serum Total bilirubin [TBIL] ≤1.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT) < 2.5 x ULN
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior androgen deprivation therapy (medical or surgical), radiation therapy or chemotherapy for prostate cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of metastatic disease (M1) on imaging studies
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone XRT, which may indicate prior treatment for cancer. Additionally, the patient's age is not specified as being over 18 years old.
